Text:
Hi
Thank you for this fantastic torrent. I have only one problem - the subtitles. The info says there are English sbts. After downloading the file I've realized there are not there. Do you know where could be the problem?
I would be very grateful for some help

There are english subs. You will find them on the srt file. You can play it with vlc or gom media players (among others perhaps?). They are free software.
Thanks for your interesting list of uploads Iggy!
